applicable_countries: All countries and territories worldwide (as of August 15, 2023 - Resolution No. 127/NQ-CP)

overview.description: Vietnam E-visa is an electronic visa issued by Vietnamese Immigration Department via online system for foreigners to enter Vietnam
overview.validity: Maximum 90 days from entry date specified in application

cost.note: Fee is non-refundable if application is refused

eligibility_requirements.passport_validity: At least 6 months from intended entry date
restrictions: Cannot apply while already in Vietnam
Must not fall under Article 21 suspension cases of Vietnam Immigration Law
Cannot have violated Vietnamese laws previously

passport_copy.description: Full passport data page scan including photo, personal information, and ICAO lines

requirements: No hat or head covering (except religious)

personal_information: Full name (exactly as in passport ICAO line)

airports: Tan Son Nhat International Airport (Ho Chi Minh City) - SGN
Da Nang International Airport (Da Nang) - DAD
Cam Ranh International Airport (Nha Trang) - CXR
Phu Quoc International Airport (Phu Quoc) - PQC
Can Tho International Airport (Can Tho) - VCA
Cat Bi International Airport (Hai Phong) - HPH
entry_ports.flexibility_note: Current e-visa format does not specify entry port, allowing flexibility to change entry point

steps: 3. Upload required documents (passport page + portrait photo)
5. Submit application and note registration code
6. Check status using registration code, email, and DOB
important_notes: No automatic email notification - must check status manually
Registration code is crucial for status checking
Applications not processed during weekends and Vietnamese holidays
Tet holiday processing suspension: January 25 - February 2, 2025

photo_errors: Uploading passport photo instead of portrait
information_errors: Mismatched information between form and passport

validity_and_usage.validity_period: 90 days maximum from intended entry date
important_notes: Validity starts from date specified in application, not arrival date
Can enter Vietnam on or after specified entry date
Cannot be extended while in Vietnam
Must apply for new visa if extension needed
multiple_entry_benefits: Can enter/exit multiple times within validity period

children: Each child needs separate e-visa if they have own passport
Include children in parent's application only if sharing passport
Same photo requirements apply to children
Special considerations for infant photos (no other people visible)

visa_exempt_countries.note: Citizens of these countries can enter visa-free for tourism for 45 days

special_cases.phu_quoc_exemption: 30-day visa exemption for Phu Quoc island entry (all nationalities)

application_rejected: Correct errors and reapply with new application
Fee is non-refundable for rejected applications
incorrect_information_on_issued_visa: Must apply for new e-visa immediately
May face boarding denial at departure airport
Contact visa service agency for assistance
status_checking: Use registration code + email + date of birth
Check status regularly on official website
Contact support only for technical issues

2025_changes: New website domains: evisa.gov.vn and thithucdientu.gov.vn
All countries now eligible for e-visa
No 30-day gap required between visa-free entries
Entry port no longer specified on e-visa document

faqs.can_i_change_entry_date: No, cannot change after submission. Validity starts from specified entry date.
faqs.can_i_enter_before_entry_date: No, cannot enter before the specified entry date in application.
faqs.can_i_change_entry_port: Yes, current e-visa format allows flexibility in entry port selection.
faqs.what_if_i_overstay: Fines and penalties apply. May affect future visa applications.
faqs.can_i_work_on_evisa: No, e-visa is only for tourism and business visits, not employment.
faqs.emergency_processing: Available through authorized agencies for urgent cases (additional fees apply)

passport_bio_page.validity_check: At least 6 months from date of return
ai_cleanup: Remove fingers from image if present

assumed_defaults.description: Default answers for common questions to improve user experience. Users can modify during form review.

ai_workflow_steps: Confirm number of travelers and their reference names
Inform user of required documents (passport bio page + photo)
Get user confirmation to start application process
Open virtual browser to Vietnam eVisa official website
Request document uploads and verify legibility
Clean up documents using AI enhancement
Fill and verify Personal Information section
Extract and fill Passport Information section
Fill number of entries based on visa type
Request travel dates or flight tickets
Complete remaining form sections with user input
